message.content:
<<<api>>>: Apache POI
<<<code>>>: 
FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(new File("yourExcelFile.xlsx"));
XSSFWorkbook workbook = new XSSFWorkbook(fis);
XSSFSheet sheet = workbook.getSheetAt(0);
Iterator<Row> rowIterator = sheet.iterator();

while(rowIterator.hasNext()) {
    Row row = rowIterator.next();
    Iterator<Cell> cellIterator = row.cellIterator();
    while(cellIterator.hasNext()) {
        Cell cell = cellIterator.next();
        // Do something with the cell's content
    }
}
fis.close();
<<<explanation>>>: Apache POI is a powerful Java library for working with Microsoft Office documents, including Excel spreadsheets. The above code opens an Excel file, gets the first sheet, and iterates over all rows and cells in that sheet. You can replace the comment with your own code to process the cell's content.
